==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|阪|神}}

===Etymology===
From the second character of [[大阪]] ''Ōsaka'' and the first character of [[神戸]] ''Kōbe''.

===Pronunciation===
* Common Accent: {{ja-accent-common|atamadaka|は|んしん|háǹshìǹ}}

===Proper noun===
{{ja-pos|proper|はんしん}}
# The cities of Ōsaka and Kōbe.
# The area around Ōsaka and Kōbe.
# The [[w:Hanshin Tigers|Hanshin Tigers]], a baseball team.

====Related terms====
* {{ja-r|京阪神|^けいはんしん}}: [[Kyoto]], [[Osaka]], and [[Kobe]]
